/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.display.repository.master.DpDisplayPageCornerSetDao.updateSet [전시페이지 코너 셋 수정] [박민우] */
UPDATE DP_DISPLAY_PAGE_CORNER_SET
add_info1 = #{addInfo1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info2 = #{addInfo2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info3 = #{addInfo3, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info4 = #{addInfo4, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info5 = #{addInfo5, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info6 = #{addInfo6, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info7 = #{addInfo7, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info8 = #{addInfo8, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info9 = #{addInfo9, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_info10 = #{addInfo10, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
altrn_text = #{altrnText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_seq = #{sortSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
disp_start_ymd = #{dispStartYmd, jdbcType=CHAR}, disp_end_ymd = #{dispEndYmd, jdbcType=CHAR}, disp_yn = #{dispYn, jdbcType=CHAR}, moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE cont_type_code = #{contTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cont_type_seq = #{contTypeSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DISP_PAGE_NO = #{dispPageNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND disp_tmpl_corner_seq = #{dispTmplCornerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND disp_tmpl_corner_set_seq = #{dispTmplCornerSetSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND disp_tmpl_no = #{dispTmplNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
